concept.title: Data Collector Log Data
concept.shortdesc: You can view and download log data.

conbody.p: Data Collectorlog datalog filesData CollectorLog data includes information about the , such as the build information, the time the started, and the time the pipeline started or stopped.

The writes log information to a log file and appends new information to the file. When the log file reaches a defined limit, it creates another file and continues writing to the file. The file name is sdc<number>.log.
The size of the file is limited by the log4j.appender.streamsets.MaxFileSize property in the logj4.properties file. delete this last sentence?

When you view log data, the console displays approximately 50,000 characters of the most recent information from the log file. You can load older log information for display. The console displays progressively older information upon request, traversing different log files when necessary.
